isis.stitle: DT/DTI-466 A and B Series DT/DTI/DTA-466 C Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - BEYERS MODEL 200 PRESSURE TEST KIT (D-200) - MAINTENANCE AND GAUGE ACCURACY TEST

step1.para: Remove cover of pressure test kit and inspect for damage to gauges such as broken cover glass, bent gauge needles, and for missing pressure connectors and nylon tubing. Replace damaged or missing parts so that the kit will operate when needed.

Remove the screws holding the gauge panel to carrying case and lift the panel from the carrying case. If any liquids are found in the tubing behind the panel, loosen the connections and blow out the liquids. Tighten all connectors as required and reassemble the gauge panel.

The hand operated pump is directly connected to 0-30 psi gauge when the kit is received. If a gauge accuracy test is desired, proceed as described under "CALIBRATING THE PRESSURE KIT using the Dwyer Slack Tube Manometer", in this section.
